location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Ext 2934/42 'Whereabouts of Mr R G Daubeny'

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in approximate chronological order from the rear to the front of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence for this description commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 6; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: The file contains a letter sent by C C Daubeny asking about her son, R G Daubeny, and the response from the Government of India, External Department, informing her of his arrival at the Kabul Legation.

name.namePart: Indian Political Service, External Affairs Department
